title: Patch Notes
content: Gale. Elminster will no longer tell Gale to speak to Mystra in the Stormshore Tabernacle if you have already done so. Fixed an issue that caused Viconia to play the wrong dialogue when defeated. Told Devella to be more patient and wait until the end of the dialogue before she moves on to Basilisk Gate after being saved from Dolor.
